description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a. Physical description: 20 lines per page; written in neat naskh in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords; marginal notes. Damp-stained and mildewed. Origin: Likely 18th century. Incipit: الحمد لله ... في الحاشية ما کان متعلقة عاما اي من الافعال العامة
author: Khuwānsārī, Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn, -1713
abstract: Gloss on al-Shahīd al-Thānī's commentary on al-Lumʻah al-Dimashqīyah.
extent: 247 leaves : paper ; 244 x 175 (160 x 109) mm bound to 245 x 179 mm
title: Ḥāshiyat Āqā Jamāl bar Sharḥ Lumʻah.
provenance: Owner's stamp and note on leaf 1a.
creator: خوانساري، محمد بن حسين، -1713
subject: Shahīd al-Thānī, Zayn al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī, 1506-1559—Rawḍah al-bahīyah fī sharḥ al-Lumʻah al-Dimashqīyah
binding_note: Full black leather with red leather doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
